price: Such was Allah’s way with those [hypocrites] who came before, and you will find no change in Allah’s way.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ فِي ٱلَّذِينَ خَلَوۡاْ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
